This method is responsible for the sequence of events related to the effect of Personality 10: the player's choice is communicated to the GameController, whose response is sent back to the client.

handleClosingServer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.CLI.CLI
Method handleClosingServer handles server crash by printing a message and closing the JVM
handleClosingServer() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUI
Method handleClosingServer removes the WAIT_TURN gray overlay and calls the end game procedures of the current scene's controller Since this method is called from another thread, Platform.runLater() ensures that the method is executed by this (GUI) thread to avoid run time exceptions
handleClosingServer() - Method in interface it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.UI
 
handleCloudPick(CloudSelectionMessage, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
It manages a cloud's selection by a player: the choice is communicated to the GameController,whose response is sent back to the client.
handleEndRound() - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
It manages the end of current round: based on the game conditions, if it was the last one it communicates the game result to all players and proceeds to close the match.
handleEndTurn(CloseTurnMessage, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
It manages a player's turn end: he is told he needs to wait for the other players to play, while the next player is sent a message notifying him his status.

It handles a client's choice for number of players and game mode by adding him to a lobby accordingly to his game parameters' selection.
handleHoverEvent(Node, Clickable) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.client.GUI.GUIControllers.GameTableController
Method handleHoverEvent renders the hover effect for the item pointed by the mouse cursor This is done only if the hovered item's type is in the clickable list of the current client state
handleLogin(LoginRequestMessage, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Server
It handles a client's name choice: if the choice is valid, the server registers it and sends a new message to client, asking for game parameters, otherwise it sends a error message.
handleMessage(Message, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.GameHandler
It manages messages from the client by calling the proper method according the message instance.
handleMessage(Message, ClientHandler) - Method in class it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Server
It handles the first messages sent by a player in order to register its name and its choice for the number of players and game mode.
